answer:
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> ast
l = ast.literal_eval(<span class="hljs-string">'[ "A","B","C" , " D"]'</span>)
l = [i.strip() <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> l]
</code></pre>

<p>So, following all the answers I decided to time the most common methods:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> time <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> time
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> re
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> json


my_str = <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">19</span>)))
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_str)

reps = <span class="hljs-number">100000</span>

start = time()
<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, reps):
    re.findall(<span class="hljs-string">"\w+"</span>, my_str)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Regex method:\t"</span>, (time() - start) / reps)

start = time()
<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, reps):
    json.loads(my_str)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"json method:\t"</span>, (time() - start) / reps)

start = time()
<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, reps):
    ast.literal_eval(my_str)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"ast method:\t\t"</span>, (time() - start) / reps)

start = time()
<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, reps):
    [n.strip() <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> n <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_str]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"strip method:\t"</span>, (time() - start) / reps)



    regex method:    <span class="hljs-number">6.391477584838867e-07</span>
    json method:     <span class="hljs-number">2.535374164581299e-06</span>
    ast method:      <span class="hljs-number">2.4425282478332518e-05</span>
    strip method:    <span class="hljs-number">4.983267784118653e-06</span>
</code></pre>

<p>So in the end regex wins!</p>
